name: How to Hug
description:
A WikiHowDreams Jam espionage game, where you need to decipher a pass phrase in order to 'hug' the contact and get the dossier of information!

Use your keyboard or the super high definition virtual Type-a-Tron to input your pass phrase response to the contact!

Music

  • Deadly Roulette Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com), Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
  • Songs from 'Big Choantza' by The New Mellow Edwards, Licensed under Creative Commons: Attribution-Noncommercial-No Derivative Works 3.0 United States License
